CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install python-support python-jinja2 python-yaml python-paramiko python-httplib2 python-crypto sshpass software-properties-common -y &&     apt-get install python-pip python-openssl python-pyasn1 -y && pip install ndg-httpsclient &&     add-apt-repository ppa:ansible/ansible-2.3 && apt-get update &&     apt-get install ansible -y  &&     echo '[local]\nlocalhost ansible_connection=local\n' > /etc/ansible/hosts
